content.rendered:
Each year, the National Student Survey (NSS) gives our final year students the opportunity to reflect on their experience at Regent College London and provide feedback about their course.
As part of the Regent College  NSS promotional campaign, eligible students had a chance to be entered into our prize draw to win one of 12 prizes of £50 Amazon vouchers.
The prize draw has been now  closed  and we are pleased to announce the winners below:

FE00285 HE05581 HE06492 HE06621
HE06681 HE06703 HE06741 HE06821
HE07048 HE07080 HE07116 HE07138

The lucky  winners will get their vouchers via e-mail next week. Congratulations to the winners and thanks all who took part in the survey.
